getSinkList

java.util.List<Sink> getSinkList()
                                 throws au.gov.ansto.bragg.cicada.core.exception.NoneAlgorithmException
Get sink list of the current algorithm of algorithm manager. (List of all sinks)

Returns:
list of sinks
Throws:
au.gov.ansto.bragg.cicada.core.exception.NoneAlgorithmException - no current algorithm handle

getSinkList

Get the sink list of a loaded algorithm of the algorithm manager.

Parameters:

See Also:
getSinkList()

subscribeSink

void subscribeSink(java.lang.Thread receiver,
                   Sink sink)
                   throws au.gov.ansto.bragg.cicada.core.exception.SubscribeFailException
Subscribe a thread instance to a specific sink. If the sink updates its signal, it will notify all the subscribed threads and updating routines will be activated by the threads. This instance will be informed when the sink get new signal.

Parameters:
receiver - customized Thread instance
sink - sink processor handle
Throws:
au.gov.ansto.bragg.cicada.core.exception.SubscribeFailException - failed to subscribe

unsubscribeSink

void unsubscribeSink(java.lang.Thread receiver,
                     Sink sink)
                     throws au.gov.ansto.bragg.cicada.core.exception.SubscribeFailException
Unsubscribe a thread instance from a specific sink. Remove it from the listener list of the sink processor.

Parameters:
receiver - Thread instance
sink - sink processor handle
Throws:
au.gov.ansto.bragg.cicada.core.exception.SubscribeFailException - failed to unsubscribe
